channel.title: NpcDialogue Cases
channel.description: How do you make npcdialogue cases together. Like case 1,2,3,4,5 are together but not 6 through w/e #. So basically you talk to someone and he says the 1st, 2nd, 3rd,4th and 5th cases but not the 6 - w/e # cases. Im sorry if it seems confusing.

item.title: NpcDialogue Cases
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:401839”][quote author=jaruanna link=topic=498896.msg3648393#msg3648393 date=1309549482]
How do you make npcdialogue cases together. Like case 1,2,3,4,5 are together but not 6 through w/e #. So basically you talk to someone and he says the 1st, 2nd, 3rd,4th and 5th cases but not the 6 - w/e # cases. Im sorry if it seems confusing.
[/quote]
in case 40 in client.java add
if(NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5){
NpcDialogue += 1;
}[/quote]

thanks i was looking at that but it seemed like it wasnt it lol.

Read full topic

item.title: NpcDialogue Cases
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

jaruanna:

How do you make npcdialogue cases together. Like case 1,2,3,4,5 are together but not 6 through w/e #. So basically you talk to someone and he says the 1st, 2nd, 3rd,4th and 5th cases but not the 6 - w/e # cases. Im sorry if it seems confusing.

in case 40 in client.java add
if(NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5){
NpcDialogue += 1;
}

Read full topic
